title: Picture News (@HelpPicture) / Twitter
body: Our latest Picture News special is available now and free for all teachers 😁 🏳️‍🌈 The ready-to-use resource is suitable for use in a class discussion, to learn more about Pride and how it is recognised around the world. Download 👉 bit.ly/3qnyHFE. Picture News. @HelpPicture. ·.
